channel.description: Recent content in fermentation on skouf.com

item.title: Experiments in mushroom garrum
item.description: Recently I’ve been experimenting with a new technique for making incredibly fast garrums. This article documents some of my findings when experimenting with making garrum from mushrooms.

item.title: Lacto-fermented red pepper juice
item.description: How to make a tangy, delicious, smoky, umami rich ferment from red peppers
